content: this moss stitch baby blanket crochet pattern is a very easy crochet baby blanket pattern that works up really quickly it can be made for any gender the size is completely customizable and you can use any medium/worsted weight yarn if you are looking for a simple and fast baby blanket crochet pattern you ll love this moss stitch blanket pattern about the crochet pattern - this is a very easy pattern that works up really quickly and looks beautiful when complete - it s perfect for any gender - the pattern includes step-by-step instructions and a video tutorial on how to crochet the moss stitch and blanket - this pattern is made with a baby in mind there are no huge holes for baby s fingers to get caught in and yet it is still lightweight and breathable - the pattern is completely customizable so you can easily adjust the width and height of the blanket - you can use any size 4 yarn also referred to as medium or worsted weight - the border is made of alternating between single_crochet and triple also known as treble crochet for a stunning textured look
